basic.description: Some of the topics discussed are: nature of the solid/liquid interface, nucleation of solid in a liquid, equilibrium and non-equilibrium shapes, attachment kinetics, solute partition at a solid-liquid interface, solute transport in the liquid and solid, macroscopic segregation, ultra-rapid solidification and metastability, generation of defects in crystals, other techniques to produce crystals. Three term-hours. R. W. Smith.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Fundamentals Of Crystal Growth
